title: Cooling Pitta Aroma Oil
cleaned_text: Description Cooling Pitta Aroma Oil: Cool off with this blend of Sandalwood, Ylang Ylang, Lavender and other essential oils. Perfect when you're feeling hot and bothered, or when temperatures are soaring outside. Ingredients Essential oils of Lemon, Ylang-Ylang, Sandalwood and Lavender. Essential Oils Recommendations You can use the aroma oils at any time, but for most people it works best to do aromatherapy while you sleep. Just set up your diffuser before you go to bed. Your room will fill with delightful fragrances, helping to restore balance all night long.
